resources.string: To play this game. You need to tilt your phone to move a ball
When you move the ball, you must stay within the \nboundaries of the shape otherwise it will be gameover
To use the Tilt feature.\n All you need to do when the game starts is tap the screen when you are ready \n and simply tilt your phone in the direction you want the ball/line to move.
The aim of the game is to trace the shape that appears on the screen by using these 2 features.\n In order to progress to the next level, you have to achieve an almost perfect score.
